data.text: Resa, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kuom joma richo,
joma chano chenro maricho e chunygi
Gipiago lewgi mabith ka lew thuol
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, awachoni niya, “In Nyasacha.”
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, ma jakonyna motegno,
Kik iyie mondo joma timbegi richo oyud gik
Mi mondo chandruok ma joma olwora bwogago,
Mi mondo makaa maliel mager oolre kuomgi,
Mi mondo joma ketho nying jowetegi kik dhi maber e piny,
Angʼeyo ni Jehova Nyasaye miyo jodhier yudo adieragi,
Joma kare biro pako nyingi adier
